name: EnCirca
overview:
EnCirca is a domain name and trademark protection company that was formed in 2001.

EnCirca operates an ICANN-Accredited registrar and supports all of the generic top-level domain names and most of the country-code top-level domain names for a total of over 200 top-level extensions.

EnCirca also powers TM.Biz, a service that protects trademarks on social media.

TM.Biz incorporates the traditional Lifecycle of a Trademark. Hereâ€™s a summary of our key Trademark Lifecycle Services:

1) Username Availability Search

TM.Biz offers a real-time global search of exact trademarks on the top 500 social networks. Features include:

  • A hit summary with a tiered breakdown of the top 50, 100, 250 and 500 networks
  • Electronic sharing of search results via email or short url
  • Archive of recently conducted searches for quick review

2) In-Use Reporting

TM.Biz offers In-Use Reports for investigation efforts regarding taken usernames matching a trademark. The In-Use Reports compiles screen shots of public profiles. The trademark lawyer can utilize this report to determine if potential infringement, dilution or impersonation is occurring.

3) Trademark Reservation

TM.Biz will reserve trademarks on the available social networks. TM.Biz does all the work of initiating and activating the user accounts on behalf of the trademark owner. TM.Biz provides a mailbox for receiving all in-coming email from the social networks. Trademark owners may access this mailbox at any time and redirect the email to other email addresses if they desire.

4) Username Watching

TM.Biz will monitor social networks to see if a trademark is reserved as a username. When a match is detected, the customer receives an email alert of the event. Watch subscriptions are available on a weekly, twice monthly or monthly frequency.
